column4: quick question... anyone having problems with 2d stuff consuming a lot of CPU on their ubuntu machines? I'm using the binary nvidia driver and in single monitor configurations and dual head things like scrolling text in a shell consume a ton of CPU
The machine is a fairly fast machine, P4 2.4Ghz, 1GB ram, fast disk etc. Nvidia 5200FX 256meg AGP video
you're using nvidia drivers, or nv?
I have 5200, never saw anything like that
